idea-plugin.name: Oceanic Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Material Oceanic Dark Theme and color scheme for IntelliJ, PHPStorm and other Jetbrains IDEs.

To install:
  • Open Settings (Preferences) | Plugins and search for Oceanic Theme
  • Install the plugin
  • Click restart your IDE
  • Go to Settings (Preferences) | Appearance & Behavior | Appearance and select Oceanic Colorful Theme in the theme dropdown.
